attributes.action: Give us a chance when vaccinated to say thank you to the NHS by donating ,say £5
attributes.additional_details: An opportunity to say thank you to the NHS plus the pharmaceutical industry also  an opportunity to generate needed funds to the NHS
attributes.background: Organise an opportunity for people to give to the NHS when they are vaccinated

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Charitable donations are a matter for individuals and not the UK Government or Parliament.
